page.title: 16Family Life in Leeswood
page.content: There is a variety of life_styles enjoyed by people in this area.Some people are quite rich,others are quite poor.The working class houses are ordinary with a living room,kitchen, bathroom and bedrooms.The same old things happen each day;children go to school,dad goes to work and mum does the housework but sometimes she may go out to work. Pets are kept such as cats,dogs and so on.Occasionally families have the odd day out.Some families do not have any transport but that is quite unusual as most people have cars. T.V. is watched a great deal and videos,computers and other luxuries are appearing in working class homes whereas the more wealthy families think nothing of having luxuries such as videos,computers,big cars and swimming pools.
